_xResult.title: One for You, One for Me Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made tulip dress with bell sleeves
_xResult.longdesc:
This made to measure red dress is the perfect choice for days at the office, leisurely days or casual parties. Based on your event, you can match it with a stiletto or sweet ballerinas and you will be ready for whatever the day or night has ahead. The bell-type sleeves feature three buttons for ease of getting in and out. Don't be shyâ€”choose your favorite of the 7 colors available.


You need a dress made custom to your measurements. You'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!
